member.name: T:EntityAction
member.summary:
used by Query.For
Delegate for Query runner actions that take an Entity and references to Component data. Entity can be used to make structural changes as needed. They will be queued in the World and then executed once the runner returns.
member.remarks: The EntityAction variant is provided to make it eas to schedule structural changes from within a runner.

member.name: T:RefAction
member.summary:
used by Query.For and Query.Job
Delegate for Query runner actions that take references to Component data.
member.remarks: There's no EntityAction variant of Query.Job, but you can use the Identity component and World.On(Identity) to perform entity operations. Generally, structural changes are deferred and executed single-threaded after the Job runner returns. Consider using Query.Batch instead to keep your Jobs running as fast as they can.
